name: Biboniclele
description:
No story, 6 levels to go and that's it.

You can view a full walkthrough of the game in this video, but try to play the game on your own!

The visual style is inspired by the LEGO Technic Bionicle series and is a small parody.

The basic gameplay consists of throwing discs. The discs bounce off walls and ricochet off switches or break fragile walls. The discs can also carry the elemental element after contact with an elemental wall to smash special walls.

A very short game, I think it is possible to complete it in 10-15 minutes.
